text:
Colin and the Thumpies is a British television series featuring Colin and the thumpies. All ten colors. The 11th Gold comes to the new date of 2017. It has two Christmas specials, It aired on United Kingdom on 30 January 2016 to 9 January 2018. This is featured by a location Thumpie School and Playground E' Thumpies. All four-five-six-seven to eleven minutes show. It has 30 characters.
Format and plot.
The Thumpies are 11 colored talking balls with no limbs and visit Colin. Colin is a beige anthropologal British teacher featuring a one fair on episode 2. He visit ten thumpies, The series has aired by 30 January 2016 to 2018. The Thumpies are creatures they visit Colin. A total of 3 series and 85 episodes.
Appearance.
His school is yellow and the fair is on the back, where Colin and the 11 thumpies live. Expect white and black.
